Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.Student of Perfection]{Student of Perfection}

You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Unblinking Flame Revelation]{Unblinking Flame Revelation} for Unblinking Flame, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Unbreaking Wave Advance]{Unbreaking Wave Advance} for Unbreaking Waves, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Unfolding Wind Rush]{Unfolding Wind Rush} for Unfolding Wind, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Untwisting Iron Buffer]{Untwisting Iron Buffer} for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
